metadata.title: CVE-2019-7443 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: KDE KAuth before 5.55 allows the passing of parameters with arbitrary typesto helpers running as root over DBus via DBusHelperProxy.cpp. Certain typescan cause crashes, and trigger the decoding of arbitrary images withdynamically loaded plugins. In other words, KAuth unintentionally causesthis plugin code to run as root, which increases the severity of anypossible exploitation of a plugin vulnerability.

criterions.comment: kauth: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
